lines.text: [referring to a giant mutant crab he just killed]
Let's be on our way. This thing may have a loving family.
For one of the strangest facts of this city beneath the sea is... Port Royal refuses to stay buried!
Good luck, Mr. Ferris! Oh... and a word about Dr. Hunter.
Ah, the female scientist. How am I going to handle her?
By keeping one thing in mind.
What's that?
Forget a female scientist and remember a woman.
[Kolvac and Collins find Garry's seaplane]
No vital damage as far as I can see. It's just out of gas.
That's damage enough.
[Joan escapes through a hail of bullets]
Why don't you quit practicing and hit something?
[bullets strike near where Tony and Jim are hiding]
They spotted us!
Did you see where it came from?
I saw where it hit - too darn close!
Do you think they have Joan?
No.
What makes you say that?
They'd have to reckon with us. Kolvac is smart enough to know that Joan is better ammunition than bullets.
[Burt points his gun at Kolvac and demands answers]
It's your turn, Johnny. Make it quick even if it isn't good.
